org.finra.herd.service.helper.notification

Class AbstractNotificationMessageBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.finra.herd.service.helper.notification.AbstractNotificationMessageBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BusinessObjectDataStatusChangeMessageBuilder, BusinessObjectDefinitionDescriptionSuggestionChangeMessageBuilder, BusinessObjectFormatVersionChangeMessageBuilder, StorageUnitStatusChangeMessageBuilder, UserNamespaceAuthorizationChangeMessageBuilder

    public abstract class AbstractNotificationMessageBuilder
extends Object
    This is an abstract class that helps build a notification message.

        Returns:
        the Velocity context map

      • buildNotificationMessages

        public List<NotificationMessage> buildNotificationMessages(NotificationEvent notificationEvent)
        Builds a list of notification messages for the change event. The result list might be empty if if no messages should be sent.
        Parameters:
        notificationEvent - the notification event
        Returns:
        the list of notification messages

      • addObjectPropertyToContext

        protected void addObjectPropertyToContext(Map<String,Object> context,
                                          String propertyName,
                                          Object propertyValue,
                                          Object jsonEscapedPropertyValue,
                                          Object xmlEscapedPropertyValue)
        Adds string property to the specified context along with the relative JSON and XML escaped copies of the property.
        Parameters:
        context - the context map
        propertyName - the name of the property
        propertyValue - the value of the property, maybe null
        jsonEscapedPropertyValue - the JSON escaped value of the property, maybe null
        xmlEscapedPropertyValue - the XML escaped value of the property, maybe null

      • evaluateVelocityTemplate

        protected String evaluateVelocityTemplate(String velocityTemplate,
                                          Map<String,Object> contextMap,
                                          String velocityTemplateName)
        Evaluates a velocity template if one is defined for the specified configuration value. If velocity template is null, null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        velocityTemplate - the optional velocity template, may be null
        contextMap - the optional context map of additional keys and values to place in the velocity context. This can be useful if you have values from an incoming request message you want to make available to velocity to use in the building of the outgoing response message.
        velocityTemplateName - the velocity template name used when Velocity logs error messages.
        Returns:
        the evaluated velocity template
